intro: Psychotria hanta, commonly known as the Hanta Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. The plant is characterized by its slender, climbing stems and opposite, elliptical leaves. Its small, clustered flowers are typically white or pale green, with prominent yellow stamens. Psychotria hanta is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests.
